name: Vaccinate Simulator
description:
Vaccination control simulation game.

You must be very attentive to the instructions and the instruction board, which must be followed to make the correct decisions "VACCINATE" or "GO WAY" You have a limited time to reach the objective of each level.

CONTROL: MOUSE ONLY.

HISTORIA

It is time to start vaccinating, but many come with false identification or days that are not, so it will be your job to control who is vaccinated and who is not. Good luck

DISEÑO PROGRAMACION Y ESTUDIO
